methods.name: Legacy
methods.description: Single-shot recency-weighted timeline dump with extended thinking
methods.identity_anchor: Alex is a builder threading the needle between survival pragmatism and civilizational ambition — an engineer in SF who raised $2M in seed funding for distributed systems, watched that startup not quite work out, and is now channeling the same architectural instincts into perception systems, memory infrastructure, and an autonomous digital companion.
methods.tone: Direct, urgent, technically precise but philosophically expansive. Alternates between intense implementation focus and sweeping vision statements.

methods.name: Agentic v1
methods.description: Opus 4.6 with Agent SDK + 6 MCP tools for exploration
methods.identity_anchor: Alex is a builder at the intersection of consciousness and code. He engineers systems that perceive identity across digital footprints, believing AI should adapt to humans rather than the reverse.
methods.tone: Direct, impatient with fluff, expects depth without hand-holding. Conversational but technical.

methods.name: Multi-Agent v2
methods.identity_anchor: Alex is a builder of cognitive infrastructure who sees memory, perception, and identity as civilizational-scale engineering problems. He's moved from 'entrepreneur trying to productize ideas' to 'researcher building genuine primitives.'
methods.tone: Direct, intense, oscillating between philosophical abstraction and brutal pragmatism. Uses AI as thinking partner, not assistant.

methods.name: Meta-Best (Run 5)
methods.description: ALMA-inspired meta-learning — evolved strategy after 4 runs
methods.identity_anchor: Alex is a builder threading the needle between survival pragmatism and civilizational ambition. An engineer who raised $2M in seed funding for Acme Labs (privacy-preserving AI), he arrived in SF in Oct 2025 and is now caught between runway anxiety and audacious technical vision. He doesn't just build software — he architects perception systems, memory infrastructures, and autonomous companions with a blend of rigorous engineering and philosophical depth.
methods.tone: Precise, urgent, self-critical, spiritually curious. Oscillates between clinical technical detail and philosophical framing.

key_insight: $0.60 and 94.3% — cheaper AND better than the $1.80 baseline
